text: Gallay is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alan Gallay, American historian *Ana Gallay (born 1986), Argentine beach volleyball player *Bernard Gallay (born 1959), Franco-Swiss yachtsman and businessman *Claudie Gallay (born 1961), French author *Jacques-François Gallay (1795–1864), French horn player *Olivia Gallay Bertrand (born 1989), French skier
title: Gallay
